page.description: Send a file to the server. Contents are sent as binary.
page.prototype: .SendFile as L (SourceFile as C, TargetFile as C)

return.name: result
return.description: Returns *[xb:.t.]* if the operation succeed. Otherwise, returns *[xb:.f.]*. If an error occurred, the *[xb:INET::SFTP CallResult]* property will contain more information.

arguments.example:
dim sftp as INET::SFTP sftp.ServerHost = "ftp.myserver.com" sftp.UserName = "Fred" sftp.Password = "Secret"
if sftp.SendFile("myData.csv","target.csv") <> .t. ' error msg = sftp.callResult.error ... end if
